name: Halloween Mobiles
description:
Here are some mobile games I made with the help of Udemy Courses. "Halloween Shooter" is the first one, others will follow in time. Many thanks to teacher Pete Jepson: you are the best! All mistakes that remain are my own.

Halloween Shooter

If you find yourself in the wrong place at the wrong time, there is only one thing you can do: shoot them up before they catch you!
